message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but $110 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $105?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $105 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $107.50. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
